channel.title: Lab Data Science
channel.description: Recent content on Lab Data Science

item.title: About
item.description: I have been a Clinical Laboratory Scientist (or a Medical Technologist as they called us back in the day) for over 15 years . In that time I have earned a PhD in Marine Biology and more recently, a Master’s in Computer Science specializing in Data Science. Currently, I manage a laboratory that provide services for a free-standing ED in South Texas. This blog will focus on statistics and data science applications in the laboratory and in my day-to-day.
